title: Systematic Media suppression coordination mechanisms - TTT Article 119
description:
Research systematic corruption pattern: Media suppression coordination mechanisms

SOURCE: Trump Tyranny Tracker Article 119
TITLE: Trump Tyranny Tracker: Day 95
URL: https://trumptyrannytracker.substack.com/p/trump-tyranny-tracker-day-95

CORRUPTION PATTERN ANALYSIS:
This research priority focuses on documenting the systematic nature of media suppression coordination mechanisms, 
moving beyond isolated incidents to reveal coordinated campaigns and institutional capture mechanisms.

KEY RESEARCH QUESTIONS:
- Which journalists were systematically targeted for investigation or harassment?
- How were press credentials weaponized to control media access?
- What coordination existed between federal agencies and private media companies?
- Which leak investigations were used to intimidate sources?
- How were social media platforms pressured to suppress specific content?
- What alternative media infrastructure emerged to counter suppression?

TIMELINE FOCUS:
- Document specific dates and coordination meetings
- Identify key actors and their systematic roles
- Map institutional capture progression
- Track resistance and countermeasures
- Connect to broader kleptocratic patterns

INDICATORS FROM SOURCE:
- Potential dates: 2018, 2026, 2028
- Key actors mentioned: To be researched
